widget.name: Welcome to the Zoo
widget.description: Thank you for visiting the 'Welcome to the Zoo' app! The app shows drawings of different animals, such as a lion, a rabbit and a buffalo. If you touch an animal, it makes a noise ('ROAR!!!'). The drawings are made by Katrina. If you have any questions and/or comments, please send me an email. Have fun!
widget.author: Leonard Stronkhorst
